{"step_by_step_thinking": "Apoptosis is a form of cell death that is regulated by dedicated genes, as mentioned in Document [4]. This rules out option D. Document [24] mentions that apoptosis is a process that does not cause inflammation, ruling out option A. This leaves us with option C, which states that apoptosis involves the swelling of organelles.
